properties.name: NumberOfDevicesRequested
properties.description: Multicast group number of devices requested. Returned after successful read.

type.description: Multicast group number of devices requested. Returned after successful read.

properties.name: NumberOfDevicesInGroup
properties.description: Multicast group number of devices in group. Returned after successful read.

type.description: Multicast group number of devices in group. Returned after successful read.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the Multicast group.

type.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the Multicast group.

properties.name: AssociateWirelessDevice
properties.description: Wireless device to associate. Only for update request.

properties.name: DisassociateWirelessDevice
properties.description: Wireless device to disassociate. Only for update request.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: Multicast group arn. Returned after successful create.

type.description: Multicast group arn. Returned after successful create.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Multicast group id. Returned after successful create.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: Multicast group status. Returned after successful read.
